ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: -good overview cf. marco models -lack of context/framing discussions of models vs. realty/policy...

I would not recommend the class as it is in between the undergraduate and Phd level of macroeconomics courses. Professor Alonso's lectures were hard to follow and most of the times students relied on the lecture slides as opposed to in-class notes to understand the material.
I wouldn't recommend the class. The approach to the material was not the best out of macro classes I have taken. It didn't have enough synthesis of the material or focus on themes of macroeconomics.
No, I would not recommend this course to another student.
I would not recommend this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I learned many new theories and models, but as mentioned before, it was hard to see the connection between the topics.
Provide me a broader picture of economics and will support my further deeper study/researches.
